name: Space Goal Cannon
description:
/!\ If the game doesn't work or doesn't work well in your browser, try the downloadable version /!\

Space Goal Cannon is a weird game made for a game design exercice where the goal is to make a button fun to press.

This game have been made in a few evenings.

Description

Press the fun button on your computer, shoot mini space shuttles into the space goal.

Controls

  • Move the camera : Mouse
  • Click the button : Mouse Click (left and right works)
  • Quit the game : Escape

Credits

  • 3D models : Low Poly Ultimate Pack by Polyperfect
  • Engine : Unity
  • Sounds : Cannon, Crowd Cheer
  • Music :
    • Jellyfish in Space by Kevin MacLeod
    • Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/3938-jellyfish-in-space
    • License: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/
